content.text: The UK National Screening Committee (UK NSC) has announced 2 new dates for its popular screening masterclass.
Places are always highly sought after, so please apply early to avoid missing out.

The screening masterclasses have been running for many years and evaluate very highly as a great interactive learning session for people from a wide range of backgrounds and with varying levels of screening knowledge. There is something for everyone.
Sessions are held over Microsoft Teams and use different teaching methods, including case studies, fun quizzes and practical exercises.

The classes are facilitated by screening expert Dr Angela Raffle, supported by Jo Harcombe and Nadia Permalloo.

The UK NSC blog provides up to date news from the UK NSC. You can register to receive updates direct to your inbox, so there is no need to keep checking for new articles. If you have any questions about this blog article, or about the work of the UK NSC, please email uknsc@dhsc.gov.uk.
